name: Quick Preloader
author: Sumon Hasan

sections.description:
Preloader

This plugin will enable custom background color and custom preloader image url in your wordpress site.

Demo

Go to Plugin Demo Site

The Features

  • Admin Options.
  • Easy to use.
  • Custom Image.
  • Custom Background Color
  • jQuery & CSS3.
  • Compatible with Google Chrome, FireFox, Opera, Safari, IE9, IE10, IE11 and with mobile devices like iPad, iPhone, Android, etc.

More Plugins

  • My Plugins
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘the-preloader’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Plugins menu > Quick Preloader
  4. Go to Settings > Quick Preloader
sections.faq:
FAQ

Do you have any question regarding the plugin usage? You can ask me questions in My Support Forum
